All or Nothing

You take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until you score a critical hit]{-1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until you score a critical hit}.

Melee

Close to the Ear

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: Deafened until end of your next turn].

Ranged

Pins and Needles

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 3}.

Unarmed

Why Me?

You provoke reactions as if you used a move action.

Spell
